Chevrolet Corvette 0-60 times

Autotk.com offers accurate information on Chevrolet Corvette 0-60 times and quarter mile from trusted sources. You may also keep track of how 0-60 times of Chevrolet Corvette changed across years and check out the model’s competitors with the same acceleration performance.

Our mission is to present an easy-to-read and comprehensive information on Chevrolet Corvette 0-60 mph and quarter mile for the devoted geeks, as it is an essential indicator of the vehicle power.

Chevrolet Corvette is an absolutely iconic vehicle for the lovers of the sports cars boasting of an outstanding 0-60 times and eye-catching design. Also, known as "Vette", this elegant beast not impresses with the power but also makes you admire its styling. It is really hard to imagine a better temptation for beautiful chicks while its smooth steering is hard to convey through the words. 

The latest 2016 Corvette Z06 2dr Coupe model is exceptionally hot itself accelerating from zero to 60 in 3.3 seconds due to its supercharged 6.2-liter aluminum V-8 engine that produces 650 hp and 650 lb-ft. Born for the track, the brutal nature of Chevrolet Corvette, incorporating a lightweight and rigid aluminum space frame, is exposed immediately after you punch the throttle. Competing with Z06 is useless unless you spend tons of money on McLaren 650S Spider or Porsche 911 Turbo S.

While the factory specs are already beyond the boldest expectations, Chevrolet Corvette's DNA still can be chiptuned to add up to 30 HP & 20 ft.-lbs.
